You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesP P] > &pre;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&prE;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2ab3/index.htm U+02AB3].
  * `&pre;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2aaf/index.htm U+02AAF].
